components.description:
A yellow face with flat, closed eyes and mouth. May convey a sense of frustration or annoyance more intense than suggested by üòê Neutral Face, as if taking a moment to collect itself.

Microsoft's design previously displayed this emoji with its eyes open, while Samsung's design previously had eyebrows.
components.title: Expressionless Face

description:
A yellow face with flat, closed eyes and mouth. May convey a sense of frustration or annoyance more intense than suggested by üòê Neutral Face, as if taking a moment to collect itself.

Microsoft's design previously displayed this emoji with its eyes open, while Samsung's design previously had eyebrows.
title: Expressionless Face

version.description: A small update to the much larger Unicode 6.0. Unicode 6.1 included 13 new emoji characters.

emoji_net_data.definition: A face with narrow, closed eyes, and a straight mouth. A deliberate display of ‚Äòno comment‚Äô as opposed to a completely neutral face. Express http://emojipedia.org/expressionless-face/
emoji_net_data.name: expressionless face

bn:00100974a: Deliberately impassive or expressionless (as a face or look).

bn:00097677a: Perplexed by many conflicting situations or statements; filled with bewilderment
Perplexed by many conflicting situations or statements; filled with bewilderment.

bn:00097291a: Marked by a lack of interest

bn:00032600n: Part of the body at the front of the head
The face is a central organ of sense and is also very central in the expression of emotion among humans and among numerous other species.
Faces are the central sense organ complexes, for those animals that have one, normally on the ventral surface of the head.
The front of the human head from the forehead to the chin and ear to ear
The front part of the head, featuring the eyes, nose, and mouth and the surrounding area.

bn:00046516n: A person, especially as one among many.
An individual is a person or a specific object.
A single physical human being as a legal subject, as opposed to a legal person such as a corporation.
A human; someone susceptible to death.

A person is a being, such as a human, that has certain capacities or attributes constituting personhood, which in turn is defined differently by different authors in different disciplines, and by different cultures in different times and places.
A person that will die eventually.
A being, such as a human, that has certain capacities or attributes constituting personhood
Abstract term defining a being, e.g. a human, that has certain capacities or attributes constituting personhood (not for use with "instance of" [P31], instead use "human" [Q5])
An individual; usually a human being.

bn:00004840n: Apathy is most commonly defined as a lack of feeling, emotion, interest, or concern.
A lack of interest; indifference, apathy.
State of indifference or the suppression of emotions
Apathy is a lack of feeling, emotion, interest, or concern.
Complete lack of emotion or motivation about a person, activity, or object; depression; lack of interest or enthusiasm; disinterest.
The trait of lacking enthusiasm for or interest in things generally.
The trait of lacking enthusiasm for or interest in things generally

apple_vendor_description: The expressionless face emoji on Apple devices presents a smooth, pale yellow circle with two simple, dark dots for eyes and a short, straight horizontal line for a mouth. Its minimalist design, characterized by soft, rounded edges and a lack of discernible emotion, conveys a neutral or unreadable state, a subtle yet effective communication tool. On Apple devices, this emoji captures a sense of stoicism or a deliberate lack of reaction, perfect for situations where words might be too much.
